root.name: 20 Squares
root.description: 20 Squares is an ancient Egyptian board game, considered by historians to be one of the oldest board games ever invented. The game is noted as having existed as early as 3000 B.C. Gameplay has been compared to board games like Backgammon and Parcheesi.The PC version of 20 Squares was developed by P.S. Neeley in 1995, as a part of his Ancient Shareware series.
